abstract: Lamar University will look into whether its men's basketball coach Pat Knight violated NCAA rule by allowing two recruits to speak with his father Bob Knight, former coach at Indiana.
snippet: Lamar University is looking into whether its new men’s coach, Pat Knight, violated an N.C.A.A. rule by allowing two recruits to speak with his father, the former Indiana coach Bob Knight.
lead_paragraph: Lamar University is looking into whether its new men’s coach, Pat Knight, violated an N.C.A.A. rule by allowing two recruits to speak with his father, the former Indiana coach Bob Knight.
